title: Vintage skins not currently displaying the overlay of authenticity
body: I bought vintage curling veigar in 2010, ever since the patch to re- release them. Some patches kill the transparent icon over the skin in load screen, this is one of those patches.

replies.body:
Hey 3 1415thon - 

> I bought vintage curling veigar in 2010, ever since the patch to re- release them. 

Just to clarify, you bought him when he initially came out, correct? Not during a re-release period?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=4qKxZshW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-04T17:36:49.852+0000)
>
> Hey 3 1415thon - 
> 
> Just to clarify, you bought him when he initially came out, correct? Not during a re-release period?

yes late 2010
Okay, gotcha. Something may be up with legacy borders. Lemme take a look!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=4qKxZshW,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T19:57:11.388+0000)
>
> Okay, gotcha. Something may be up with legacy borders. Lemme take a look!

This is still broken,
You're right, it is. D: Let me poke the team working on this to see if we have a plan/ETA.
